changeSet.author: Yash

preConditions.sqlCheck:
select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN ( select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ( 'Peggy Kuchocha', 'Douglas Mudzonga', 'Thenjiwe Mpofu', 'Irvine Ncube', 'Judah Chingwena', 'Efasi Mvula', 'Nyaradzo Rupondo', 'Tsitsi Marume', 'Sign Jimu', 'Amos Sungwa'
) and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" ) AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counseling");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to "Provider name for Enhanced adherence counseling"
